Desc.entry: A volunteer organisation supplying administrative services mainly to Chinese students, scholars and their families at the University of Sheffield and Sheffield Hallam University. Services include establishing links with the local Council, the Universities and organisations in China and organising day trips and celebration parties. Organises regular meetings and cultural activities and promotes a Chinese presence at University events. Events include the Chinese New Year Celebrations in February, a Chinese Culture Week in November, a Chinese and New Year celebration/performance in December and a Chinese National Foundation Day celebration.
